Uses of Class
Library.Platform

  • Packages that use Platform 
    Package Description
    Interface
    Houses all of the User Interface driver code, including the main application class, event listeners and field validation, custom Swing widgets and application state holders
    Library
    All game library data and storage logic, including sorting and enumerations
